body.name: Yoga Mat Bag-Yoga Tote Bag w/Clips-Wipeable Yoga Bags and Carriers Fits All Your Stuff-Gym Bag with Yoga Mat Holder-Travel w/Yoga Mat Bags for Women
deliveryMessages: FREE delivery Wednesday, February 21 on orders shipped by Amazon over $35. Order within 4 hrs 59 mins
features: Black Yoga Bags: This classic, stylish yoga mat bag carrier made from black fabric and leather is designed to hold all the accessories a yogi would need. The adjustable straps of our yoga mat bags ensure a secure and comfortable fit for mats of all sizes.

Spacious & Organized: The expandable bottom of our yoga bags and carriers fits all your stuff giving you more carrying room for all your accessories. Keep your phone, wallet, and other accessories in the extra zipper pockets of these yoga mat bags for women for easy access.

Versatile Carrying Options: The removable cross-body strap of the yoga mat holder offers versatile carrying options. These straps on the outside help attach your travel yoga mat with ease and are the perfect yoga accessories for yoga classes, gym sessions, or even as a travel bag.

Easy to Clean: The black waterproof fabric of our gym bag with yoga mat holder protects the contents inside the bag and is easily wipeable. The durability of the wipeable fabric ensures our yoga bag for women will stay looking brand new for a long time.

Functional Design: The functional design of our yoga mat carrying bag enables seamless transitions that transform the yoga bag to a travel bag or a beach bag. This easy-to-pack yoga backpack can slip over the handle of a roller bag or can be folded to fit into a gym locker or studio cubby for storage.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 28, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Perfect Fit for Thick Mat
reviews.reviewText: Have used this bag for a short while, but love the ease with which I can attach and release the mat. The bag interior space is roomy, just right for my purposes. Seems well constructed and although the hardware isn’t “beefy” it works well and doesn’t contribute unnecessary weight.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on July 13, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Thoughtfully designed yoga bag
reviews.reviewText: I absolutely love this bag!My climbing gym offers yoga classes, and hauling a shoe bag, backpack, yoga mat bag, water bottle, etc. was getting crazy so I wanted an all-in-one solution.This bag easily holds my shoes, climbing harness, chalk bag, belay device, first-aid-kit, water bottle, phone, keys, towel, and of course my yoga mat without looking bulky.Gone are the days of struggling with the terrible too-tight sleeve that came with my yoga mat, and I no longer look like I’m ready to backpack through Europe when I show up to the gym with all my gear slung over me!I also love that if my daughter wants to join me at the gym I can expand the bottom to accommodate her gear too.This bag is sturdy, thoughtfully designed, has plenty of pockets and slots for organization, and it looks great too.Five stars, I highly recommend it!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 2, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Material Feels Cheap, but good capacity
reviews.reviewText: I refer to it as my "hurt less" bag, because it hold all my portable stretching and PT supplies. The straps hold my yoga mat AND blanket rolled together, and it's easy to clip and unclip.I wish it came in different colors, and that the fabric felt less cheap.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on July 13, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Fits everything you need!
reviews.reviewText: I have a workout class that I go to that requires you bring your own weights & mat. It was a crazy juggling act trying to carry my waterbottle, mat, 1-2 sets of weights, keys & phone (since I prefer most of my workout leggings to not have pockets). This bag was the perfect solution!! I love all of the space to pack whatever I need to workout and now I can just grab it and go!I was also pleasantly surprised with the quality of material. It’s almost silky- very neat! And the brown leather accents are very modern. I’m in love! Definitely happy with this product.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on July 12, 2023
reviews.reviewText: I just received the yoga bag today. I was seriously impressed with the quality of materials and construction. . I am not a yoga person, but this bag can be used for many things. I like the way the bottom can unzip and expand the depth of the bag. I am planning on purchasing another to use as a diaper bag for my new great granddaughter. I will be using my bag for traveling, as a computer case, a beach bag, as a craft bag, and even to carry teaching supplies. I am also going to purchasing a few more to send with my grandchildren as they return to college. Thanks, Karen

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on September 21, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 3.0 out of 5 stars Great design inadequate zipper strength
reviews.reviewText: I would love this bag if the zippers were heavier. This bag is everything I need as a yoga teacher- expandable, has lots of pockets, inside and out, flexible, holds large yoga mat and all of my yoga supplies.But - as I loaded it up with everything - Yes it did fit and I could carry it just fine, the zipper was really hard to get closed and It is pretty flimsy. I could tell that it would not last. I returned it without using it : (I would pay $20 - $30 more for this design bag with heavy duty seams and zippers.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on July 17, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Roomy and Strong
reviews.reviewText: I workout at three different locations. Inside and outside. When I opened the box it looked like a luxury bag, it's really pretty and good quality material. It holds everything! My weights, bands, spin shoes, yoga mat, and towel. It has a pocket for my phone, chapstick, keys, and spin shoes tool. This bag will hold it all. It's strong enough for my weights (20lbs so far). Love it!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 15, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Great bag for Yoga supplies
reviews.reviewText: This bag is roomy enough inside for gym clothes and 2 yoga blocks. I like the strap on the outside to carry my yoga mat.
